df-evls
blocks.content: Define the evaluation map for the polynomial algebra. The function ` ( ( I evalSub S ) `` R ) : V --> ( S ^m ( S ^m I ) ) ` makes sense when ` I ` is an index set, ` S ` is a ring, ` R ` is a subring of ` S ` , and where ` V ` is the set of polynomials in ` ( I mPoly R ) ` . This function maps an element of the formal polynomial algebra (with coefficients in ` R ` ) to a function from assignments ` I --> S ` of the variables to elements of ` S ` formed by evaluating the polynomial with the given assignments. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-evls(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6, setvar s7) {

blocks.name: df-evl
blocks.content: A simplification of ` evalSub ` when the evaluation ring is the same as the coefficient ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: evlslem4
blocks.content: The support of a tensor product of ring element families is contained in the product of the supports. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 18-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: psrbagfsupp
blocks.content: Finite bags have finite nonzero-support. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 18-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm psrbagfsupp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s0, co(cn0, cmap, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn), cfn)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cn), cfn))
  simprd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cn), cfn), wf(c0, c2, cn0))
  biimpac(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wa(wf(c0, c2, cn0), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cn), cfn)))
  psrbag(s0, c2, c3, c0, c1)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cn), cfn)), wcel(c2, c3), wf(c0, c2, cn0))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wf(c0, c2, cn0))
  psrbagf(s0, c2, c3, c0, c1)
  frnnn0fsupp(c2, c3, c0)
}

blocks.name: psrbagev1
blocks.content: A bag of multipliers provides the conditions for a valid sum. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 18-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm psrbagev1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wf(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), c3, c4), wbr(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), cfsupp, c5)))
  -| wceq(c6, crab(s0, co(cn0, cmap, c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn), cfn)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmg, c7))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, universe))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  jca(w0, wf(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), c3, c4), wbr(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), cfsupp, c5))
  off(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cn0, c4, c3, c3, universe, universe, w0)
  sylan(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wcel(cv(hs1), c4)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), c4), wcel(c7, cmnd))

blocks.name: evlslem6
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ evlseu . Finiteness and consistency of the top-level sum. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 26-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm evlslem6(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, class c11, class c12, class c13, class c14, class c15, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wf(cmpt(s0, c0, co(cfv(c1, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), c3, co(c4, cgsu, co(cv(s0), cof(c5), c6)))), c0, c7), wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, co(cfv(c1, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), c3, co(c4, cgsu, co(cv(s0), cof(c5), c6)))), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c8))))
  -| wceq(c9, co(c10, cmpl, c11))
  -| wceq(c12, cfv(cbs, c9))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cbs, c8))
  -| wceq(c13, cfv(cbs, c11))
  -| wceq(c0, crab(s1, co(cn0, cmap, c10), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s1)), cn), cfn)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmgp, c8))

blocks.name: evlslem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ evlseu , give a formula for (the unique) polynomial evaluation homomorphism. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 26-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: evlseu
blocks.content: For a given interpretation of the variables ` G ` and of the scalars ` F ` , this extends to a homomorphic interpretation of the polynomial ring in exactly one way. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Mar-2015.)

  simprrd(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, c1), cmpt(hs0, c4, cmpt(s0, co(c3, cmap, c4), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, co(co(c4, cmpl, c7), crh, co(c5, cpws, co(c3, cmap, c4)))), wceq(ccom(c0, cfv(cascl, co(c4, cmpl, c7))), cmpt(hs0, c6, cxp(co(c3, cmap, c4), csn(cv(hs0))))))
  syl3anc(w0, wa(wcel(c0, co(co(c4, cmpl, c7), crh, co(c5, cpws, co(c3, cmap, c4)))), wa(wceq(ccom(c0, cfv(cascl, co(c4, cmpl, c7))), cmpt(hs0, c6, cxp(co(c3, cmap, c4), csn(cv(hs0))))), wceq(ccom(c0, c1), cmpt(hs0, c4, cmpt(s0, co(c3, cmap, c4), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))), wcel(c4, c8), wcel(c5, ccrg), wcel(c6, cfv(csubrg, c5)))
  evlsval2(hs0, s0, c4, c8, c5, c6, c0, co(c4, cmpl, c7), co(c5, cpws, co(c3, cmap, c4)), cfv(cascl, co(c4, cmpl, c7)), cmpt(hs0, c6, cxp(co(c3, cmap, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))), c1, cmpt(hs0, c4, cmpt(s0, co(c3, cmap, c4), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), c7, c3)
  eqid(co(c5, cpws, co(c3, cmap, c4)))
  eqid(cfv(cascl, co(c4, cmpl, c7)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c6, cxp(co(c3, cmap, c4), csn(cv(hs0)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), c2), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, c2))), wfn(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c4))
  ffnd(c1, c4, cfv(cbs, co(c4, cmpl, c7)), w0)
  mvrf2(c1, c4, cfv(cbs, co(c4, cmpl, c7)), co(c4, cmpl, c7), c7, c8, w0)
  eqid(co(c4, cmpl, c7))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c4, cmpl, c7)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c7, crg), wcel(c6, cfv(csubrg, c5)))
  subrgring(c6, c5, c7)
  fvco2(c1, c4, c2, c0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c4, cmpt(s0, co(c3, cmap, c4), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), c2), cmpt(s0, co(c3, cmap, c4), cfv(cv(s0), c2))), wcel(c2, c4))
  fvmpt(hs0, c2, c4, cmpt(hs0, c4, cmpt(s0, co(c3, cmap, c4), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), cmpt(s0, co(c3, cmap, c4), cfv(cv(s0), c2)), cmpt(s0, co(c3, cmap, c4), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  mpteq2dv(s0, co(c3, cmap, c4), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c4, cmpt(s0, co(c3, cmap, c4), cfv(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))

thm evlsvar(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 `(c1 ` c2))=(s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4)‚Ü¶(s0 ` c2)))
  ‚ä£ c0 =((c4[evalSub]c5)` c6)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(c4[mVar]c7)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(c5[|`s]c6)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c8)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà CRing)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚àà(SubRing ` c5))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c8)
} = {
  3eqtr3d((c0 `(c1 ` c2)), (s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4)‚Ü¶(s0 ` c2)), ((c0 ‚àò c1)` c2), ((hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4)‚Ü¶(s0 ` hs0)))` c2), w0)
  fveq1d((c0 ‚àò c1), c2, (hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4)‚Ü¶(s0 ` hs0))), w0)
  simprrd(w0, (c0 ‚àò c1)=(hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4)‚Ü¶(s0 ` hs0))), c0 ‚àà((c4[mPoly]c7)[RingHom](c5[^](c3[‚Ü¶]c4))), (c0 ‚àò(algSc `(c4[mPoly]c7)))=(hs0 ‚àà c6 ‚Ü¶((c3[‚Ü¶]c4)√ó { hs0 })))
  syl3anc(w0, (c0 ‚àà((c4[mPoly]c7)[RingHom](c5[^](c3[‚Ü¶]c4)))‚àß((c0 ‚àò(algSc `(c4[mPoly]c7)))=(hs0 ‚àà c6 ‚Ü¶((c3[‚Ü¶]c4)√ó { hs0 }))‚àß(c0 ‚àò c1)=(hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4)‚Ü¶(s0 ` hs0))))), c4 ‚àà c8, c5 ‚àà CRing, c6 ‚àà(SubRing ` c5))
  evlsval2(hs0, s0, c4, c8, c5, c6, c0, (c4[mPoly]c7), (c5[^](c3[‚Ü¶]c4)), (algSc `(c4[mPoly]c7)), (hs0 ‚àà c6 ‚Ü¶((c3[‚Ü¶]c4)√ó { hs0 })), c1, (hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4)‚Ü¶(s0 ` hs0))), c7, c3)
  eqid((c5[^](c3[‚Ü¶]c4)))
  eqid((algSc `(c4[mPoly]c7)))
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà c6 ‚Ü¶((c3[‚Ü¶]c4)√ó { hs0 })))
  syl2anc(w0, ((c0 ‚àò c1)` c2)=(c0 `(c1 ` c2)), c1[Fn]c4, c2 ‚àà c4)
  ffnd(c1, c4, (Base `(c4[mPoly]c7)), w0)
  mvrf2(c1, c4, (Base `(c4[mPoly]c7)), (c4[mPoly]c7), c7, c8, w0)
  eqid((c4[mPoly]c7))
  eqid((Base `(c4[mPoly]c7)))
  syl(w0, c7 ‚àà Ring, c6 ‚àà(SubRing ` c5))
  subrgring(c6, c5, c7)
  fvco2(c1, c4, c2, c0)
  syl(w0, ((hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4)‚Ü¶(s0 ` hs0)))` c2)=(s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4)‚Ü¶(s0 ` c2)), c2 ‚àà c4)
  fvmpt(hs0, c2, c4, (hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4)‚Ü¶(s0 ` hs0))), (s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4)‚Ü¶(s0 ` c2)), (s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4)‚Ü¶(s0 ` hs0)))
  mpteq2dv(s0, (c3[‚Ü¶]c4), (s0 ` hs0), (s0 ` c2), hs0 = c2)
  fveq2(hs0, c2, s0)
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4)‚Ü¶(s0 ` hs0))))
  mptex(s0, (c3[‚Ü¶]c4), (s0 ` c2))
  ovex(c3, cmap, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c8)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c((c5[^](c3[‚Ü¶]c4)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]c4)‚Ü¶(s0 ` c2)))

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: evlval
blocks.content: Value of the simple/same ring evaluation map. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm evlval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(co(c1, ces, c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c1, cevl, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c2))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, cfv(co(c1, ces, c2), c3), co(c1, cevl, c2))
  pm2.61i(wceq(co(c1, cevl, c2), cfv(co(c1, ces, c2), c3)), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c1, universe, c2, universe, cevl, cfv(co(c1, ces, c2), c3), cfv(co(cv(hs0), ces, cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs1))))
  fveq12d(co(cv(hs0), ces, cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), co(c1, ces, c2), c3, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  oveq12(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c2, ces)
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), c3))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), c3, cfv(cbs, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c2, cbs)
  fvex(co(c1, ces, c2), c3)
  eqtr4d(co(c1, cevl, c2), cfv(co(c1, ces, c2), c3), cfv(emptycls, c3), wn(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))))
  syl6eqr(co(c1, cevl, c2), cfv(emptycls, c3), emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))))
  mpt2ndm0(hs0, hs1, c1, universe, c2, universe, cevl, cfv(co(cv(hs0), ces, cv(hs1)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs1))))
  df-evl(hs0, hs1)
  0fv(c3)
  fveq1d(co(c1, ces, c2), c3, emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))))
  ovprc(c1, c2, ces)
  reldmevls()
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(co(c1, ces, c2), c3))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(co(c1, ces, c2), c3))
}

thm evlval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =((c1[evalSub]c2)` c3)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(c1[eval]c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c2)
} = {
  eqtri(c0, ((c1[evalSub]c2)` c3), (c1[eval]c2))
  pm2.61i((c1[eval]c2)=((c1[evalSub]c2)` c3), (c1 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c1, universe, c2, universe, cevl, ((c1[evalSub]c2)` c3), ((hs0[evalSub]hs1)`(Base ` hs1)))
  fveq12d((hs0[evalSub]hs1), (Base ` hs1), (c1[evalSub]c2), c3, (hs0 = c1 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  oveq12(hs0, c1, hs1, c2, ces)
  adantl(hs0 = c1, hs1 = c2, (Base ` hs1)= c3)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs1), c3, (Base ` c2), hs1 = c2)
  fveq2(hs1, c2, cbs)
  fvex((c1[evalSub]c2), c3)
  eqtr4d((c1[eval]c2), ((c1[evalSub]c2)` c3), (‚àÖ ` c3), ¬¨(c1 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  syl6eqr((c1[eval]c2), (‚àÖ ` c3), emptycls, ¬¨(c1 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  mpt2ndm0(hs0, hs1, c1, universe, c2, universe, cevl, ((hs0[evalSub]hs1)`(Base ` hs1)))
  df-evl(hs0, hs1)
  0fv(c3)
  fveq1d((c1[evalSub]c2), c3, emptycls, ¬¨(c1 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  ovprc(c1, c2, ces)
  reldmevls()
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(((c1[evalSub]c2)` c3))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(((c1[evalSub]c2)` c3))
}

blocks.name: evlrhm
blocks.content: The simple evaluation map is a ring homomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm evlrhm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ccrg)), wcel(c3, co(c4, crh, c5)))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cevl, c2))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c0, cmpl, c2))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c2, cpws, co(c6, cmap, c0)))
} = {
  eleqtrd(c3, co(c4, crh, c5), co(co(c0, cmpl, co(c2, cress, c6)), crh, c5), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ccrg)))
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ccrg), wcel(c3, co(co(c0, cmpl, co(c2, cress, c6)), crh, c5)), wcel(c6, cfv(csubrg, c2)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ccrg)), wcel(c6, cfv(csubrg, c2)), wcel(c2, crg))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ccrg), wcel(c2, crg))
  crngring(c2)
  subrgid(c2, c6)
  evlsrhm(c0, c1, c2, c6, c3, co(c0, cmpl, co(c2, cress, c6)), c5, co(c2, cress, c6), c6)
  evlval(c3, c0, c2, c6)
  eqid(co(c0, cmpl, co(c2, cress, c6)))
  eqid(co(c2, cress, c6))
  oveq1d(co(c0, cmpl, co(c2, cress, c6)), crh, c5, c4, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ccrg)))
  syl6eqr(co(c0, cmpl, co(c2, cress, c6)), c4, co(c0, cmpl, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ccrg)))
  oveq2d(c0, cmpl, co(c2, cress, c6), c2, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ccrg)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ccrg), wceq(co(c2, cress, c6), c2))
  ressid(c2, ccrg, c6)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm evlrhm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà CRing)‚Üí c3 ‚àà(c4[RingHom]c5))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c0[eval]c2)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Base ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(c0[mPoly]c2)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(c2[^](c6[‚Ü¶]c0))
} = {
  eleqtrd(c3, (c4[RingHom]c5), ((c0[mPoly](c2[|`s]c6))[RingHom]c5), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà CRing))
  mpd3an3(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà CRing, c3 ‚àà((c0[mPoly](c2[|`s]c6))[RingHom]c5), c6 ‚àà(SubRing ` c2))
  syl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà CRing), c6 ‚àà(SubRing ` c2), c2 ‚àà Ring)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà CRing, c2 ‚àà Ring)
  crngring(c2)
  subrgid(c2, c6)
  evlsrhm(c0, c1, c2, c6, c3, (c0[mPoly](c2[|`s]c6)), c5, (c2[|`s]c6), c6)
  evlval(c3, c0, c2, c6)
  eqid((c0[mPoly](c2[|`s]c6)))
  eqid((c2[|`s]c6))
  oveq1d((c0[mPoly](c2[|`s]c6)), crh, c5, c4, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà CRing))
  syl6eqr((c0[mPoly](c2[|`s]c6)), c4, (c0[mPoly]c2), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà CRing))
  oveq2d(c0, cmpl, (c2[|`s]c6), c2, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà CRing))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà CRing, (c2[|`s]c6)= c2)
  ressid(c2, ccrg, c6)
}

blocks.name: evlsscasrng
blocks.content: The evaluation of a scalar of a subring yields the same result as evaluated as a scalar over the ring itself. (Contributed by AV, 12-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm evlsscasrng(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, class c11, class c12, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), cfv(c3, cfv(c4, c2))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(co(c5, ces, c6), c7))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c5, cevl, c6))
  -| wceq(c8, co(c5, cmpl, c9))
  -| wceq(c9, co(c6, cress, c7))
  -| wceq(c10, co(c5, cmpl, c6))
  -| wceq(c11, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cascl, c8))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cascl, c10))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c12))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, ccrg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, cfv(csubrg, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c7))
} = {
  3eqtr4rd(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), cfv(c3, cfv(c4, c2)), cfv(cfv(co(c5, ces, c6), c11), cfv(c4, c2)), cxp(co(c11, cmap, c5), csn(c2)), w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(cfv(co(c5, ces, c6), c11), cfv(c4, c2)), cxp(co(c11, cmap, c5), csn(c2)), cfv(cfv(co(c5, ces, c6), c11), cfv(cfv(cascl, co(c5, cmpl, co(c6, cress, c11))), c2)), w0)
  fveq2d(cfv(co(c5, ces, c6), c11), cfv(c4, c2), cfv(cfv(cascl, co(c5, cmpl, co(c6, cress, c11))), c2), w0)
  fveq1d(c4, c2, cfv(cascl, co(c5, cmpl, co(c6, cress, c11))), w0)
  syl5eq(c4, cfv(cascl, co(c5, cmpl, co(c6, cress, c11))), cfv(cascl, c10), w0)
  fveq2d(cascl, c10, co(c5, cmpl, co(c6, cress, c11)), w0)
  syl5eq(c10, co(c5, cmpl, co(c6, cress, c11)), co(c5, cmpl, c6), w0)
  oveq2d(c5, cmpl, c6, co(c6, cress, c11), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c6, co(c6, cress, c11)), wcel(c6, ccrg))
  eqcomd(c6, co(c6, cress, c11), wcel(c6, ccrg))

thm mpfproj(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cmap, c1), cfv(cv(s0), c2)), c3, cfv(cfv(co(c1, ces, c4), c5), cfv(co(c1, cmvr, co(c4, cress, c5)), c2)), w0)

  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(co(c1, ces, c4), c5), cfv(co(c1, cmvr, co(c4, cress, c5)), c2)), crn(cfv(co(c1, ces, c4), c5))), wfn(cfv(co(c1, ces, c4), c5), cfv(cbs, co(c1, cmpl, co(c4, cress, c5)))), wcel(cfv(co(c1, cmvr, co(c4, cress, c5)), c2), cfv(cbs, co(c1, cmpl, co(c4, cress, c5)))))
  3syl(w0, wfn(cfv(co(c1, ces, c4), c5), cfv(cbs, co(c1, cmpl, co(c4, cress, c5)))), wcel(cfv(co(c1, ces, c4), c5), co(co(c1, cmpl, co(c4, cress, c5)), crh, co(c4, cpws, co(c0, cmap, c1)))), wf(cfv(co(c1, ces, c4), c5), cfv(cbs, co(c1, cmpl, co(c4, cress, c5))), cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, co(c0, cmap, c1)))))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(cfv(co(c1, ces, c4), c5), co(co(c1, cmpl, co(c4, cress, c5)), crh, co(c4, cpws, co(c0, cmap, c1)))), wcel(c1, c6), wcel(c4, ccrg), wcel(c5, cfv(csubrg, c4)))
  evlsrhm(c1, c6, c4, c5, cfv(co(c1, ces, c4), c5), co(c1, cmpl, co(c4, cress, c5)), co(c4, cpws, co(c0, cmap, c1)), co(c4, cress, c5), c0)

  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, co(c0, cmap, c1))))
  ffn(cfv(co(c1, ces, c4), c5), cfv(cbs, co(c1, cmpl, co(c4, cress, c5))), cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, co(c0, cmap, c1))))
  mvrcl(co(c1, cmvr, co(c4, cress, c5)), c2, cfv(cbs, co(c1, cmpl, co(c4, cress, c5))), co(c1, cmpl, co(c4, cress, c5)), c1, co(c4, cress, c5), c6, w0)

thm mpfsubrg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, ccrg), wcel(c3, cfv(csubrg, c2))), wcel(c4, cfv(csubrg, co(c2, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c2), cmap, c0)))))

blocks.name: mpff
blocks.content: Polynomial functions are functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpff(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, co(c2, cmap, c3), c2))
  -| wceq(c1, crn(cfv(co(c3, ces, c4), c5)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))
} = {
  pwselbas(c0, co(c2, cmap, c3), c2, co(c4, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c4), cmap, c3)), c4, cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c4), cmap, c3))), ccrg, universe, wcel(c0, c1))
  oveq2i(c4, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c4), cmap, c3), co(c2, cmap, c3))
  oveq1i(cfv(cbs, c4), cmap, c3, c2)
  eqcomi(cfv(cbs, c4), c2)
  simp2d(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c4, ccrg), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c5, cfv(csubrg, c4)))
  ovexd(c2, cmap, c3, wcel(c0, c1))
  sseldd(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c4), cmap, c3))), c1, wcel(c0, c1))
  3syl(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c4), cmap, c3)))), w3a(wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c4, ccrg), wcel(c5, cfv(csubrg, c4))), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, co(c4, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c4), cmap, c3)))))
  mpfrcl(c0, c1, c3, c4, c5)
  mpfsubrg(c3, universe, c4, c5, c1)
  subrgss(c1, co(c4, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c4), cmap, c3)), cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c4), cmap, c3))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c4, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c4), cmap, c3))))
  id(wcel(c0, c1))
}

thm mpfaddcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(co(c0, cof(c3), c2), c1))
  -| wceq(c1, crn(cfv(co(c4, ces, c5), c6)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c5))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(co(c0, cof(c3), c2), c1, co(c0, cfv(cplusg, co(c5, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4))), c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))

  eqid(co(c5, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4)))
  simp2d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c5, ccrg), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c6, cfv(csubrg, c5)))
  ovexd(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  sseldd(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c5, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4))), c1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  sseldd(c2, cfv(cbs, co(c5, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4))), c1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c5, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4)))), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, co(c5, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4)))))
  subrgss(c1, co(c5, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4)), cfv(cbs, co(c5, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c5, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  mpcom(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(co(c0, cfv(cplusg, co(c5, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4))), c2), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, co(c5, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, co(c5, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4)))), w3a(wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c5, ccrg), wcel(c6, cfv(csubrg, c5))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), w3a(wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c5, ccrg), wcel(c6, cfv(csubrg, c5))))
  mpfrcl(c0, c1, c4, c5, c6)
  mpfsubrg(c4, universe, c5, c6, c1)
  3expib(wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, co(c5, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4)))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(co(c0, cfv(cplusg, co(c5, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4))), c2), c1))
  subrgacl(c1, co(c5, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4)), c0, c2, cfv(cplusg, co(c5, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4))))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, co(c5, cpws, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, c4))))

thm mpfmulcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(c0[oF(c3)]c2)‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ c1 = ran(((c4[evalSub]c5)` c6))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(√ó ` c5)
} = {
  eqeltrrd((c0[oF(c3)]c2), c1, (c0[(√ó `(c5[^]((Base ` c5)[‚Ü¶]c4)))]c2), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1))

  simp2d((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), c5 ‚àà CRing, c4 ‚àà ùïå, c6 ‚àà(SubRing ` c5))
  ovexd((Base ` c5), cmap, c4, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1))
  sseldd(c0, (Base `(c5[^]((Base ` c5)[‚Ü¶]c4))), c1, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1))
  simpl(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1)
  sseldd(c2, (Base `(c5[^]((Base ` c5)[‚Ü¶]c4))), c1, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1))
  syl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), c1 ‚äÜ(Base `(c5[^]((Base ` c5)[‚Ü¶]c4))), c1 ‚àà(SubRing `(c5[^]((Base ` c5)[‚Ü¶]c4))))
  subrgss(c1, (c5[^]((Base ` c5)[‚Ü¶]c4)), (Base `(c5[^]((Base ` c5)[‚Ü¶]c4))))
  eqid((Base `(c5[^]((Base ` c5)[‚Ü¶]c4))))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1)
  mpcom((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), (c0[(√ó `(c5[^]((Base ` c5)[‚Ü¶]c4)))]c2)‚àà c1, c1 ‚àà(SubRing `(c5[^]((Base ` c5)[‚Ü¶]c4))))
  syl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), c1 ‚àà(SubRing `(c5[^]((Base ` c5)[‚Ü¶]c4))), (c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c5 ‚àà CRing ‚àß c6 ‚àà(SubRing ` c5)))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1, (c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c5 ‚àà CRing ‚àß c6 ‚àà(SubRing ` c5)))

  mpfsubrg(c4, universe, c5, c6, c1)

blocks.name: mpfind
blocks.content: Prove a property of polynomials by "structural" induction, under a simplified model of structure which loses the sum of products structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2015.)
